sentences.sContent: We will always confirm the revised amount to you in writing before debiting your account.
sentences.sCn: 在记入你的借方账户前，我们每次都会以书面形式向你确认修改过的数额。

phrases.pCn: 借项清单；借方通知；收款票

trans.tranOther: to record in financial accounts the money that has been spent or that is owed
a decrease in the amount of money in a bank account, for example because you have taken money out of it
